title: LoL players, lets make this game enjoyable
body:
**Imagine this, you all had a hard day's work, pour yourself a glass of juice, sit down and go on que for a game of league. Wins, loss, you deal with em, happens to the best of us.

But what I personally, and maybe you, don't want to deal with is an idi*t who straight up bans the champion that you intended (and declared) to play.

Please help report and watch out for this player, help a brother out and report him, help get rid of the trash in this League of Legends server, so that you and I may enjoy this pastime with full effect.

_name removed_ Level 30, Silver III (at the time this was posted)

Yeah, it happens.

I suggest you play with friends for this game.  Solo Q design is really bad with stories like yours and more.  Better to find some players to play with on a regular basis, that way you can build on positioning and match up with each others.

Try and play with atleast 2-3 players you know, it more than enough to win the game.

I understand you're frustrated but buddy you're breaking the rules on the forum (name shaming? or something similar) I suggest u just blur the name out and just generally rant about the idea behind people like that ;3
